post:
Iniz is the ultimate destination providing top quality VPS hosting services. At a affordable budget and customers in mind our VPS hosting services is the best solution with complete control and root access.

Iniz happily operates with four locations with more launching soon, we currently have presence in Alblasserdam, Netherlands (Europe) and we cover all 3 parts of United States with enterprise nodes in Los Angeles (West Coast), Chicago (Central) and Buffalo (East Coast).

Owned & operated by Web Phase Limited (#08199520)

- Hardware RAID10 w/ BBU write caching
- OpenVZ Virtualisation
- Full root access
- Free & Instant Setup
- 1 Dedicated IPv4
- 5 Dedicated IPv6 (In NL & LA)
- TUN/TAP/PPP Options
